com.safety4kids.game

Class Safety4Kids

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • com.safety4kids.game.Safety4Kids
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

    public class Safety4Kids
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    This class is the entry point to the game. It is called by DesktopLauncher, and first plays a splash screen before starting the main menu.
    Author:
    Erfan Yeganehfar, Bill Bai Ms. Krasteva

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create()
        This method loads the splash screen, and keeps it on until necessary elements are loaded in. It serves as a buffer to prevent the game from lagging. It is called by the constructor.

      • render

        public void render()
        This method calls the superclass render() method, which renders the active screen to display it.
        Specified by:
